scripts.build: npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm install --legacy-peer-deps --prefix client && npm run build:client --prefix client && rm -rf public && mkdir -p public && if [ -d client/dist ]; then cp -a client/dist/. public/; elif [ -d client/build ]; then cp -a client/build/. public/; else echo '‚ùå No client build output found (expected client/dist or client/build)'; exit 1; fi && echo '--- public/' && ls -lah public | head && echo '--- public/assets/' && ls -lah public/assets | head
